rows.label: qst003601_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, you must be the ones Moui
mentioned. Looking to join the
Militia Corps, are you?

rows.label: qst003601_msg0002
rows.name:
You just wanted to help out?
Well, that's a shame.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0003
rows.name: Very well. I'll tell you about it.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0004
rows.name:
I ordered a load of stuff, but it hasn't
arrived yet.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0005
rows.name:
It was at the Nopon Camp in the nether
parts of Gula where I ordered it.
A Nopon lass called Mopopo, it was.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0006
rows.name:
I don't get it... All the other stuff I
ordered from them came when they
said it would. Maybe something's up.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0007
rows.name:
Maybe a monster or something got 'em.
I'd be no good helping 'em with
something like that.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0008
rows.name:
That's why I asked Moui if he'd send
some good fighters over...

rows.label: qst003601_msg0009
rows.name:
The Nopon Camp's out on the
Garanti Plain. Right near the Waytree,
it is.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0010
rows.name:
I know it's a big job, but do you mind
going to the Nopon Camp and seeing
what's up with them?

rows.label: qst003601_msg0011
rows.name:
It'd really help us out if you could do
that. Thanks a million!

rows.label: qst003601_msg0101
rows.name:
The Nopon Camp's out on the
Garanti Plain. Right near the Waytree,
it is.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0102
rows.name:
I hope they just lost track of time when
they stopped for lunch or something.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0201
rows.name:
Oh, you're back! What what was it?
It wasn't a monster or something was
it?

rows.label: qst003601_msg0202
rows.name:
Huh? She wouldn't bring it because
the delivery fees have changed? Oh...

rows.label: qst003601_msg0203
rows.name: But you brought it for me instead?

rows.label: qst003601_msg0204
rows.name:
That's very good of you. I'm sorry to
put you out like that.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0205
rows.name:
But thank you so much! You really
helped me out there!

rows.label: qst003601_msg0206
rows.name:
I did always think the charges were
a bit high. This explains a lot...

rows.label: qst003601_msg0207
rows.name:
If they've been adding on extra
charges, I'm all for cracking down on
that. But if she won't deliver at all...

rows.label: qst003601_msg0208
rows.name:
Oh? It sounded like she had a
craving for Tasty Sausages?
The little gannet...

rows.label: qst003601_msg0209
rows.name:
That little Mopopo's always munching
something on her way home, she is.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0210
rows.name:
She only has to get wind of any fad
food or new delicacy, and she can't
wait to try it.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0211
rows.name: Right! I know what I'll do!

rows.label: qst003601_msg0212
rows.name:
Next time I might see if I can sweeten
the deal for her with a few tasty treats.
That might balance out the price issue!

rows.label: qst003601_msg0213
rows.name:
Thank you so much. You really helped
me out.

rows.label: qst003601_msg0214
rows.name:
I'll be sure to tell Moui how helpful you
were.
